name: Easy Bruschetta from RED GOLD®
author: Red Gold
summary: A quick, easy appetizer recipe for game day or a cocktail party.  Our deliciously flavored Red Gold® Petite Diced Tomatoes with Garlic & Olive Oil are what make this recipe so quick and simple!  All you have to add is fresh basil and grated Parmesan Cheese – now that is easy!
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can RED GOLD® Petite Diced Tomatoes with Garlic & Olive Oil, well drained
1 (9 ounce) box rosemary and olive oil wheat crackers, or baguette slices
directions: Place 2 teaspoons of Red Gold Petite Diced Tomatoes with Garlic & Olive Oil on each cracker or baguette slice
Sprinkle with 1 teaspoon cheese and 1/2 teaspoon of basil
